item.title: Re: DMG Firearms
item.content:encoded: Maybe add them as a separate table on the Weapons page with an Optional Rules heading?

item.title: DMG Firearms
item.content:encoded:
One thing that ive sorta noticed (But not really been bothered by due to a semi lack of need) is the lack of the firearms from the DMG being listed on the wiki.

Should this be changed? As other things such as the UA modern magic subclasses reference them, as well as the fact that its just sorta strange for them to not be present

another question though is if we are to add them, where do we add them? Do we just add them to the weapons page, or something?
